thread.title: Olympic snowboarder Mark McMorris makes movie debut with ‘In Motion’
thread.title_full: Olympic snowboarder Mark McMorris makes movie debut with ‘In Motion’

author: DAVID EBNER
title: Olympic snowboarder Mark McMorris makes movie debut with ‘In Motion’
text:
Sports Canadian snowboarder Mark McMorris sails through the air at the Rosa Khutor Exterme Park on Feb. 8, 2014 during the Sochi Winter Olympics. McMorris recently made a 40-minute film called In Motion. (John Lehmann/The Globe and Mail) Canadian snowboarder Mark McMorris sails through the air at the Rosa Khutor Exterme Park on Feb. 8, 2014 during the Sochi Winter Olympics. McMorris recently made a 40-minute film called In Motion.(John Lehmann/The Globe and Mail) Olympic snowboarder Mark McMorris makes movie debut with ‘In Motion’ Add to ... VANCOUVER — The Globe and Mail 
Published Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015 9:51PM EDT 
Last updated
